titleStmt.title: The iudgement of the Apostles and of those of the first age, in all points of doctrine questioned betweene the Catholikes and Protestants of England, as they are set downe in the 39. Articles of their religion. By an old student in Diuinitie.
titleStmt.author: Broughton, Richard.

publicationStmt.publisher: By the widdow of Mark Wyon, at the signe of the golden Phœnix,

notesStmt.note: "An old student in Diuinitie" = Richard Broughton.
An answer to: Rogers, Thomas. The faith, doctrine, and religion, professed and protected in the realme of England.
Reproduction of the original in Emmanuel College (University of Cambridge). Library.

place.placeName: the signe of the golden Phœnix
